text_block_list.name: Agnes Digital
text_block_list.text:
The big blue sky, fluffy white clouds...<n>The summer of my
youth!

text_block_list.name: Agnes Digital
text_block_list.text:
It's the summer camp! I'm gonna<n>train like CRAAAZYYY!
And then, and<n>THEN...

text_block_list.name: Peppy Umamusume
text_block_list.text:
Hey, I heard there's a festival<n>tonight! Let's go check it out
after<n>training. It'll be so fun! ♪

text_block_list.name: Snippy Umamusume
text_block_list.text: Who said I'm going with you?

text_block_list.name: Agnes Digital
text_block_list.text:
...Mmnmsgh, that was a lucky catch.<n>What a perfect start to
the camp.

text_block_list.name: Agnes Digital
text_block_list.text: Wait, no! I've gotta get ready for<n>practice!
choice_data_list: Without fangirling? Not even a little?
Without fangirling? Not even a little?

text_block_list.name: Agnes Digital
text_block_list.text:
I appreciate the consideration, but<n>nope, I'm fine! I'll go get
prepped!

...Something feels off. I'm not sure<n>what's wrong, but it
happens again<n>during practice.

text_block_list.name: Agnes Digital
text_block_list.text:
Whew... Hey, Trainer! I just finished<n>all my laps up and
down the bea...

text_block_list.name: Agnes Digital
text_block_list.text:
Ah! Those two Umamusume over<n>there are that pair of
rivals<n>everyone's been talking about! The<n>two that seem
like mortal enemies on<n>screen but then they've actually got<n>
this super adorable awkward<n>friendship budding in real life!

text_block_list.name: Agnes Digital
text_block_list.text:
Fwahaha, and now they're checking<n>out the shops
together... Oh no! The<n>little black-haired one just slipped!

text_block_list.name: Agnes Digital
text_block_list.text:
But nooo! The other one catches her<n>by the hand with
cyborg-like precision!<n>A-and neither one of them lets go!<n>
Are they gonna keep walking like<n>that... oh my gosh! Aaa?!

text_block_list.name: Agnes Digital
text_block_list.text: Nnnnmsdlk... Hrrnnaksdlajh!

text_block_list.name: Agnes Digital
text_block_list.text:
...Whew. Almost lost my composure<n>there. I swear I felt my
soul leaving<n>my body for a second.

text_block_list.name: Agnes Digital
text_block_list.text: Anyways! C'mon, Trainer! Let's get<n>back to practice!
choice_data_list:
We've got time for a break if you wanna let out
the otaku talk.

We've got time for a break if you wanna let out
the otaku talk.

text_block_list.name: Agnes Digital
text_block_list.text:
Wha?! N-no, no, no, nope! I'm okay!<n>Let's keep powering
through the<n>training! Now!

And then it hits me. The festival!<n>Maybe she's trying to
finish practice<n>early so she can go simp.
choice_data_list:
When we're done, do you want to head to the
festival?

text_block_list.name: Agnes Digital
text_block_list.text: Ah! Aaaaah! I'd love to! I can't wait!

text_block_list.name: Agnes Digital
text_block_list.text:
So, which stalls should we hit first?<n>I'm cool doing whatever
you—

text_block_list.name: Underclassman
text_block_list.text:
Heeey! You've gotta try this shaved<n>ice! They're so artsy,
and they've got<n>some crazy flavors!

text_block_list.name: Upperclassman
text_block_list.text: Ahaha! You should see your tongue!<n>It's super bright blue.

text_block_list.name: Agnes Digital
text_block_list.text: ...Phew.

text_block_list.name: Agnes Digital
text_block_list.text: S-so like I said, where to?! What do<n>you wanna see?
The Agnes Digital I know would'vestood there staring "respectfully" forminutes. There's definitely something up, so I pull her aside tocheck if everything's okay.

text_block_list.name: Agnes Digital
text_block_list.text: Huh? The beach? I thought you<n>wanted to see the festival.
choice_data_list: Maybe later. Are you feeling okay, Digital?
Maybe later. Are you feeling okay, Digital?

text_block_list.name: Agnes Digital
text_block_list.text: Me? I-I'm fine. Why do you ask?
choice_data_list:
Because you've been avoiding fangirl stuff all
day.

Because you've been avoiding fangirl stuff all
day.

text_block_list.name: Agnes Digital
text_block_list.text: What? I'm not avoiding anything! I<n>just wanted to, um...

text_block_list.name: Agnes Digital
text_block_list.text: I wanted to try doing what youwant! That's all.

text_block_list.name: Agnes Digital
text_block_list.text:
I dunno... You always listen to me<n>ramble, and you let me
drag you all<n>over the place.

text_block_list.name: Agnes Digital
text_block_list.text:
Having you around supporting my<n>interests has made every
day so<n>much brighter—like I'm living some<n>kinda fangirl
dream!

text_block_list.name: Agnes Digital
text_block_list.text:
I don't know what I'd do without<n>you. I don't think I could
go back to<n>simping alone!

text_block_list.name: Agnes Digital
text_block_list.text: So what I'm trying to say is... you're<n>my partner.

text_block_list.name: Agnes Digital
text_block_list.text: My otaku partner in crime!

text_block_list.name: Agnes Digital
text_block_list.text:
There are so many Umamusume out<n>there, running every
day with passion<n>in their hearts. This is their era—the<n>
height of Umamusume racing is NOW.

text_block_list.name: Agnes Digital
text_block_list.text:
Everywhere I look, I see beautiful,<n>dazzling Umas! I could
die of moe any<n>second, but I won't back down. Love<n>is
war.

text_block_list.name: Agnes Digital
text_block_list.text:
I'll be their strongest soldier. 'Cause<n>I know that even
when my heart's<n>ready to burst, you have my back.<n>The
joy of simping is ours to share.

text_block_list.name: Agnes Digital
text_block_list.text: We're partners—through thick and<n>thin.

text_block_list.name: Agnes Digital
text_block_list.text: But when I stopped to think about it,when have I had your back?When have I supported you?Never—I've just been getting hardcarried this whole time!

text_block_list.name: Agnes Digital
text_block_list.text:
And I'm not having that! I decided I'd<n>be there to share
your interests and<n>help you chase your dreams!

text_block_list.name: Agnes Digital
text_block_list.text:
So go ahead and fire away! I'll<n>support you one hundred
percent!

While I'm flattered... I don't want this<n>to be at the expense
of Digital's<n>interests.

After all, her unending passion for<n>Umamusume is what
inspired me to<n>scout her.
I think my dream is probably...
choice_data_list: I just want to see you smile.
I just want to see you smile.

text_block_list.name: Agnes Digital
text_block_list.text: ...What? Wait, my smile? Whywould you—

text_block_list.name: Agnes Digital
text_block_list.text: Do you feel that?! The passionradiating from all those beautifulUmamusume?! Their smiles just fillmy heart with so much joy!

text_block_list.name: Agnes Digital
text_block_list.text: You, you see me... the way I see my<n>oshis?

text_block_list.name: Agnes Digital
text_block_list.text:
Huh? A wallflower like me? I don't...<n>understand. I'm
struggling to wrap my<n>head around this, but...

text_block_list.name: Agnes Digital
text_block_list.text: I-I'm glad... I'm honored.

text_block_list.name: Agnes Digital
text_block_list.text:
...Why'd you have to make things all<n>awkward?! Like, you
know that<n>feeling when you get a really heartfelt<n>comment
on a joint fic from another<n>fanartist?

text_block_list.name: Agnes Digital
text_block_list.text: Hrrnnngh! Anyways!

text_block_list.name: Agnes Digital
text_block_list.text:
...I won't hide my simping! I'll keep<n>worshipping my oshis!
And I'll do it<n>with the biggest smile you've ever<n>seen!

text_block_list.name: Agnes Digital
text_block_list.text:
And with that settled, let's hurry and<n>find some
Umamusume to cheer on<n>from the shadows! Got any ideas<n>
where to look?
choice_data_list:
The festival dances? Or maybe there are a few
out doing a test of courage in the dark...

text_block_list.name: Agnes Digital
text_block_list.text:
Oooh! Nice thinking, Trainer! Umas<n>dancing side-by-side... or
getting<n>scared and accidentally h-holding<n>hands!

text_block_list.name: Agnes Digital
text_block_list.text:
Aaasdjkh—Oh no, I'm getting excited<n>just
imagigingnsjkladarrgh! What're<n>we doing standing around
here?!

text_block_list.name: Agnes Digital
text_block_list.text: We've got simping to do, Partner!<n>And I've got your back!
